sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Viennese attorney involved in the estate of Mrs.Sofie Deutsch following her death on January 5, 1917. The address of his office at that time was Mariahilfestraße 26.

Correspondence exists between Schenker and Türkel regarding the stipend for "impecunious skilled composers and similarly qualified composition pupils" for which she left money at Schenker's discretion, and regarding her bequest to assist him in publishing his works. This correspondence, some of it fragmentary, is preserved as OC 1/23, 34r; OC 16/27-29, 30-33, 36-37, 38, 39-40, 41-42; OC 38/146v; OJ 14/40[a] and [b].
